titleStmt.title: An expedient for regulating the customes and excise Approved by divers well affected marchants, and others of the citty of London. Humbly represented to the supream authority of the nation, the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England. By Francis Cradock. Marchant.
titleStmt.author: Cradocke, Francis, d. 1670?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
